column3: School of Mathematics and Computer Science
column5: Swansea University and Université Grenoble Alpes offer two dual award MSc degrees in Computer Science: Informatique.Both courses lead to degrees from both universities and both are two academic years long, involving one year in Swansea and one year in Grenoble. The year in Grenoble is usually taught in English but can be taken in French if you are sufficiently fluent.The Swansea route starts in Swansea and finishes in Grenoble. The available specialisms are:
column7: Please visit our website for the Computer Science: Informatique course fee information.
